name: Jacob's Snake Game
description:
CHECK OUT MY TAKE OF THE CLASSIC NOKIA 3310 GAME - SNAKE

RULES OF THE GAME

- Use the arrow keys to move the snake

- Make the snake grow longer by directing it towards the food

- Do not let the snake touch itself or you will lose

** Please note that this is unfortunately not a mobile friendly game. It works on all browsers, but for best results Google Chrome is the recommended browser **

Enjoy!!!
